programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: Life in the African bush is a game of survival, for both hunter and hunted. Add babies to the mix and you‚Äôll see astounding feats of courage as mothers risk life and limb to protect their young. In spring, tall grass helps babies hide out of sight, but it also camouflages predators on the prowl. This game drive captures extraordinary behaviour as families and individuals battle to eat, defend, and raise young.

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: Lions kill four buffaloes in a stampede, while in another drying river a buffalo fights off five of the big cats. As the dry winter looms, heading out on a game drive means checking in at all the remaining waterholes. This is where the action plays out. Each event is unpacked and explained, offering a highly charged, emotional and informative ride.

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: Hungry crocs battle a dangerous pod of hippos. The hippos take on a group of male lions. A honey badger battles for life against leopards, and wild dogs cause chaos everywhere they go! In the wilds of Southern Africa, the long, dry winter brings a desperation to the animals who live here. Prepare yourself for a highly charged, emotional and informative ride.

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: Life in the African bush is a game of survival, for both hunter and hunted. Add babies to the mix and you‚Äôll see astounding feats of courage as mothers risk life and limb to protect their young. programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Beloved clinic house cat, Tater, falls ill and the team bands together to save him. Charles debuts a new look, Dr. Pol treats a wood-chewing steer, and Dr. Brenda looks after a lab with stomach issues. A nosey Chihuahua eats a poisonous snack, so Dr. Lisa dispenses a messy antidote and Dr. Nicole jumps in to rescue a mama goat in labor.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: An ice storm shuts down the clinic and newborn labs are melting hearts. When treacherous weather leaves injured animals in its wake, Dr. Pol and his team slide in to fix busted hips and toe tips. Dr. Lisa handles a demanding delivery while Dr. Brenda impresses by corralling cattle and wrangling racehorses.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: From a harrowing farrowing to an emergency kidding, the vets pull off miracles! There‚Äôs no pause in paws as Dr. Brenda and Dr. Lisa treat a variety of foot injuries, including a Sheltie with broken toes. Dr. Pol examines a massive mastiff with tummy trouble and an injured rabbit. The Pol family add a pregnant Friesian mare to the herd and Dr. Nicole has her hands full with a rooster and a cat.

programme.title: Wild Hunters
programme.desc: Despite their ancient appearance, reptiles are creatures full of surprises and sophistication. Much like dinosaurs, reptiles are hugely efficient hunters..

programme.title: Wild Hunters
programme.desc: When on the hunt, snakes judge to perfection the very instant that separates life from death. Venomous snakes are one of the most lethal animals on the planet. .

programme.title: Wild Hunters
programme.desc: Wolves are a supreme example of cooperative hunting, their efficiency based on hierarchy within a pack that demands loyalty..
